text: Main issue before Court of Appeal is when information gven to government in business deal should be made public. See Friday Spectator.
At Ontario Court of Appeal while lawyers split hairs over why decision not to release. USSC settlement deal should be released.
PJ Mercanti tells #rise2015 Carmen‘s new logo will be a phoenix, mythical bird that reinvents itself often. That is key to future.
PJ and Joey Mercanti praise father‘s grit in building Carmen‘s Group. ‘We want your legacy to live on.‘

Listening to 90 year survivor of Nazi death camps sing Life is a Cabaret. In Yiddish yet! Hope never dies.
Kristalnacht was the start of the Holocaust. We must never forget the effect of hatred. Pray for peace over all the Earth.
At Kristalnacht memorial at Adas Israel synagogue. Never again can we let this happen.
#thepush. Raise valid question why is video of Coleman-Ferguson still being held back. Needed to settle the issue.

8 years ago today my wife Marg died. A little piece of my soul died also. Much has changed since 8 years, but she has never left my heart.
